attributes.action: Remewable energy source funding and development
attributes.additional_details:
The government should stop or lessen funding to nuclear fission plants focussing the money instead on renewable energy sources and initiatives such as tidal and wave power, manditory solar panel installation on all new builds, increasing the efficiency of solar panels and many other renewable sources etc.
The governement should also think about providing more funding to new renewable technology.
In addition to this revise the renewable energy targets making them more ambitious but still possible.
